zh-cn: 奇平诺顿的卡梅伦男爵戴维·威廉·唐纳德·卡梅伦
en: The Rt Hon. The Lord Cameron of Chipping Norton
David William Donald Cameron, Baron Cameron of Chipping Norton

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，保守党成员。曾于2010年至2016年担任英国首相，2005年至2016年担任保守党党魁。2023年重返政坛，出任外交、联邦及发展事务大臣。
description.en: British politician of the Conservative Party. Served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 2010 to 2016 and Leader of the Conservative Party from 2005 to 2016. Returned to politics in 2023 as Secretary of State for Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 英国商界女性，戴维·卡梅伦的妻子。
description.en: British businesswoman and wife of David Cameron.

description.zh-cn: 英国股票经纪人，戴维·卡梅伦的父亲。
description.en: British stockbroker and father of David Cameron.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦的母亲。
description.en: Mother of David Cameron.

description.zh-cn: 英国伦敦西敏市的一个地区，戴维·卡梅伦的出生地。
description.en: An area in the City of Westminster, London, UK. Birthplace of David Cameron.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伯克郡的著名独立寄宿学校，戴维·卡梅伦曾在此就读。
description.en: A famous independent boarding school in Berkshire, England, where David Cameron was educated.

nodes.id: 牛津大学布雷齐诺斯学院

zh-cn: 牛津大学布雷齐诺斯学院

description.zh-cn: 牛津大学的成员学院之一，戴维·卡梅伦的母校。
description.en: A constituent college of the University of Oxford, and David Cameron's alma mater.

en: 2016 United Kingdom European Union membership referendum

description.zh-cn: 关于英国是否应该脱离欧盟的全民公投。公投结果为脱欧派获胜，导致时任首相戴维·卡梅伦辞职。
description.en: A referendum on whether the United Kingdom should leave the European Union. The result was a victory for the Leave campaign, leading to the resignation of then-Prime Minister David Cameron.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，在戴维·卡梅伦辞职后接任保守党党魁和英国首相。
description.en: British politician who succeeded David Cameron as Leader of the Conservative Party and Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，时任英国首相。于2023年任命戴维·卡梅伦为外交大臣。
description.en: British politician, serving as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. Appointed David Cameron as Foreign Secretary in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，曾任英国首相。戴维·卡梅伦早期曾为其工作。
description.en: British politician who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. David Cameron worked for him in his early career.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，曾任财政大臣。戴维·卡梅伦曾是他的特别顾问。
description.en: British politician who served as Chancellor of the Exchequer. David Cameron was his special adviser.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，曾任伦敦市长和英国首相。他是戴维·卡梅伦的大学同学，但在脱欧公投中是其政治对手。
description.en: British politician, former Mayor of London and Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. He was a university contemporary of David Cameron and a political opponent during the Brexit referendum.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一个中间偏右政党，戴维·卡梅伦曾长期担任其党魁。
description.en: A centre-right political party in the United Kingdom, of which David Cameron was the long-serving leader.

en: Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

description.zh-cn: 英国的政府首脑职位，戴维·卡梅伦于2010年至2016年担任此职。
description.en: The head of government of the United Kingdom, a position held by David Cameron from 2010 to 2016.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，工党成员，戴维·卡梅伦的前任英国首相。
description.en: British politician of the Labour Party, and David Cameron's predecessor as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一个中间派政党，在2010年至2015年期间与保守党组成联合政府。
description.en: A centrist political party in the United Kingdom, which formed a coalition government with the Conservative Party from 2010 to 2015.

description.zh-cn: 2015年举行的英国国会下议院选举。戴维·卡梅伦领导的保守党在这次选举中赢得多数席位，得以单独组建政府。
description.en: The 2015 election for the House of Commons of the United Kingdom. The Conservative Party, led by David Cameron, won a majority of seats, enabling them to form a government alone.

description.zh-cn: 2024年举行的英国国会下议院选举。保守党在此次选举中落败，导致戴维·卡梅伦离任外交大臣。
description.en: The 2024 election for the House of Commons of the United Kingdom. The Conservative Party's defeat in this election led to David Cameron's departure as Foreign Secretary.

nodes.id: 外交、联邦及发展事务大臣

zh-cn: 外交、联邦及发展事务大臣
en: Secretary of State for Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Affairs

description.zh-cn: 英国内阁中负责外交事务的高级大臣职位。戴维·卡梅伦于2023年至2024年担任此职。
description.en: A senior ministerial position in the UK Cabinet responsible for foreign affairs. David Cameron held this post from 2023 to 2024.

en: House of Commons of the United Kingdom

description.zh-cn: 英国国会的下议院。戴维·卡梅伦曾长期担任其议员。
description.en: The lower house of the Parliament of the United Kingdom. David Cameron was a long-serving member.

description.zh-cn: 英国国会的上议院。戴维·卡梅伦在2023年被册封为终身贵族后成为其成员。
description.en: The upper house of the Parliament of the United Kingdom. David Cameron became a member in 2023 after being created a life peer.

description.zh-cn: 前任英国君主。戴维·卡梅伦在其任期内担任首相。
description.en: Former monarch of the United Kingdom. David Cameron served as Prime Minister during her reign.

description.zh-cn: 现任英国君主。戴维·卡梅伦在其任期内担任外交大臣。
description.en: Current monarch of the United Kingdom. David Cameron served as Foreign Secretary during his reign.

en: William IV of the United Kingdom

description.zh-cn: 19世纪的英国国王，戴维·卡梅伦是其直系后裔。
description.en: King of the United Kingdom in the 19th century, of whom David Cameron is a direct descendant.

description.zh-cn: 英国国王威廉四世的情妇，戴维·卡梅伦是其直系后裔。
description.en: Mistress of King William IV of the United Kingdom, of whom David Cameron is a direct descendant.

description.zh-cn: 一家英国媒体公司，戴维·卡梅伦在从政前曾在此担任公共关系部门主管。
description.en: A British media company where David Cameron worked as Director of Corporate Affairs before his political career.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，戴维·卡梅伦的前任保守党党魁。
description.en: British politician and David Cameron's predecessor as Leader of the Conservative Party.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，前自由民主党党魁。在戴维·卡梅伦的联合政府中担任副首相。
description.en: British politician and former leader of the Liberal Democrats. Served as Deputy Prime Minister in David Cameron's coalition government.

nodes.id: 甘民乐与纪理历联合内阁

zh-cn: 甘民乐与纪理历联合内阁

description.zh-cn: 由戴维·卡梅伦领导的保守党与尼克·克莱格领导的自由民主党于2010年至2015年组成的英国联合政府。
description.en: The coalition government of the United Kingdom from 2010 to 2015, formed by the Conservative Party led by David Cameron and the Liberal Democrats led by Nick Clegg.

en: Same-sex marriage in the United Kingdom

description.zh-cn: 指在英国将同性婚姻合法化的相关法律。戴维·卡梅伦推动并支持了该法案的通过。
description.en: Refers to the laws legalizing same-sex marriage in the United Kingdom. David Cameron pushed for and supported the passage of the legislation.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治人物，前任法国总统。曾就欧元区问题与戴维·卡梅伦发生冲突。
description.en: French politician and former President of France. Clashed with David Cameron over Eurozone issues.

description.zh-cn: 印度外交部长，是戴维·卡梅伦就任外交大臣后会晤的首位外国政要。
description.en: Minister of External Affairs of India, who was the first foreign dignitary to meet David Cameron after he became Foreign Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，2016年保守党党魁选举候选人。她的退选使得文翠珊自动当选。
description.en: British politician and candidate in the 2016 Conservative Party leadership election. Her withdrawal led to Theresa May being elected unopposed.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦于1996年6月1日与萨曼莎·谢菲尔德结婚。
description.en: David Cameron married Samantha Sheffield on June 1, 1996.

description.zh-cn: 伊恩·卡梅伦是戴维·卡梅伦的父亲。
description.en: Ian Cameron is David Cameron's father.

description.zh-cn: 弗勒·蒙特是戴维·卡梅伦的母亲。
description.en: Fleur Mount is David Cameron's mother.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦于1966年10月9日出生于伦敦马里波恩。
description.en: David Cameron was born in Marylebone, London on October 9, 1966.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦从13岁起就读于伊顿公学。
description.en: David Cameron attended Eton College from the age of 13.

relationships.target: 牛津大学布雷齐诺斯学院

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦于1985年至1988年在牛津大学布雷齐诺斯学院修读哲学、政治学及经济学，并以一级荣誉毕业。
description.en: David Cameron studied Philosophy, Politics and Economics at Brasenose College, Oxford from 1985 to 1988, graduating with a first-class honours degree.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦与鲍里斯·约翰逊是牛津大学的同学，并且同为布灵登俱乐部成员。
description.en: David Cameron and Boris Johnson were contemporaries at Oxford University and were both members of the Bullingdon Club.

description.zh-cn: 在2016年英国脱欧公投期间，戴维·卡梅伦领导留欧阵营，而鲍里斯·约翰逊是脱欧阵营的领军人物，两人是政治对手。
description.en: During the 2016 UK Brexit referendum, David Cameron led the Remain campaign, while Boris Johnson was a leading figure in the Leave campaign, making them political opponents.

description.zh-cn: 1991年，戴维·卡梅伦被借调到唐宁街10号，为时任首相约翰·梅杰工作。
description.en: In 1991, David Cameron was seconded to 10 Downing Street to work for then Prime Minister John Major.

description.zh-cn: 1992年英国大选后，戴维·卡梅伦被任命为财政大臣诺曼·拉蒙特的特别顾问。
description.en: After the 1992 general election, David Cameron was appointed as a Special Adviser to the Chancellor of the Exchequer, Norman Lamont.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，戴维·卡梅伦离开政府部门，加入卡尔顿传播公司担任公共关系部门主管。
description.en: In 1994, David Cameron left government service to join Carlton Communications as Director of Corporate Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦于2001年当选为威特尼选区的国会议员，并于2016年辞去该职位。
description.en: David Cameron was elected Member of Parliament for Witney in 2001 and resigned from the position in 2016.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦在2005年当选为保守党党魁，并于2016年辞职。
description.en: David Cameron was elected Leader of the Conservative Party in 2005 and resigned in 2016.

description.zh-cn: 2010年大选后，保守党与自由民主党组成联合政府，共同执政至2015年。
description.en: After the 2010 general election, the Conservative Party formed a coalition government with the Liberal Democrats, governing together until 2015.

description.zh-cn: 白高敦于2010年5月11日辞去首相职务，戴维·卡梅伦接替他成为英国首相。
description.en: Gordon Brown resigned as Prime Minister on 11 May 2010, and was succeeded by David Cameron.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦于2010年至2016年担任英国首相。
description.en: David Cameron served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 2010 to 2016.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦于2016年7月13日辞去首相职务，由文翠珊接任。
description.en: David Cameron resigned as Prime Minister on 13 July 2016 and was succeeded by Theresa May.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦领导的保守党在2015年大选中获胜，使他得以连任首相并组建多数党政府。
description.en: The Conservative Party led by David Cameron won the 2015 general election, allowing him to continue as Prime Minister and form a majority government.

description.zh-cn: 作为2015年大选的竞选承诺，戴维·卡梅伦推动并举行了关于英国是否脱离欧盟的公投。
description.en: As a campaign promise in the 2015 general election, David Cameron initiated and held the referendum on the UK's membership of the European Union.

description.zh-cn: 由于脱欧公投的结果是英国退出欧盟，与他支持留欧的立场相悖，戴维·卡梅伦宣布辞去首相职务。
description.en: As the result of the Brexit referendum was for the UK to leave the EU, contrary to his pro-Remain stance, David Cameron announced his resignation as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 利雅华在2016年保守党党魁选举中退选，使得文翠珊成为唯一候选人并自动当选，从而接替戴维·卡梅伦。
description.en: Andrea Leadsom's withdrawal from the 2016 Conservative Party leadership contest left Theresa May as the sole candidate, leading to her automatic election to succeed David Cameron.

description.zh-cn: 2023年11月13日，首相里希·苏纳克任命戴维·卡梅伦为外交、联邦及发展事务大臣。
description.en: On November 13, 2023, Prime Minister Rishi Sunak appointed David Cameron as Secretary of State for Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Affairs.

position.en: Member of the House of Lords

description.zh-cn: 为便于出任内阁大臣，戴维·卡梅伦于2023年11月被册封为终身贵族，进入上议院。
description.en: To facilitate his appointment to the cabinet, David Cameron was created a life peer in November 2023, becoming a member of the House of Lords.

position.zh-cn: 外交、联邦及发展事务大臣
position.en: Secretary of State for Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Affairs

description.zh-cn: 在里希·苏纳克内阁中，戴维·卡梅伦担任外交大臣。
description.en: David Cameron served as Foreign Secretary in Rishi Sunak's cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 印度外交部长苏杰生是戴维·卡梅伦就任外交大臣后会晤的首位外国政要。
description.en: Indian Minister of External Affairs S. Jaishankar was the first foreign dignitary to meet David Cameron after his appointment as Foreign Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 保守党在2024年大选中失败，导致政府更迭，戴维·卡梅伦随之卸任外交大臣。
description.en: The Conservative Party's defeat in the 2024 general election led to a change of government, and David Cameron subsequently left his post as Foreign Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 在保守党与自由民主党的联合政府中，尼克·克莱格担任副首相，是首相戴维·卡梅伦的副手。
description.en: In the Conservative-Liberal Democrat coalition government, Nick Clegg served as Deputy Prime Minister, second to Prime Minister David Cameron.

description.zh-cn: 作为首相，戴维·卡梅伦推动并支持了英格兰和威尔士同性婚姻合法化的法案。
description.en: As Prime Minister, David Cameron pushed for and supported the bill to legalize same-sex marriage in England and Wales.

description.zh-cn: 2011年，时任法国总统萨科齐曾就欧元区问题公开批评和喝令戴维·卡梅伦，显示出两人之间的紧张关系。
description.en: In 2011, then-French President Sarkozy publicly criticized and rebuked David Cameron over Eurozone issues, indicating a tense relationship between the two.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦是英国国王威廉四世与其情妇桃乐西·乔丹的直系后裔。
description.en: David Cameron is a direct descendant of King William IV of the United Kingdom and his mistress, Dorothea Jordan.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·卡梅伦是英女王伊丽莎白二世的第五代表兄弟。
description.en: David Cameron is a fifth cousin, twice removed, of Queen Elizabeth II.
